name: Summary of federal obligations for research and experimental development, by type of R&D and type of performer, for selected agencies: FYs 2019–21
description: Summary of federal obligations for research and experimental development, by type of R&D and type of performer, for selected agencies: FYs 2019–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: type_of_r_d_and_type_of_performer
variableMeasured.description: Type of R&D and type of performer hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_2019
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.name: field_2020
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.name: field_2021_preliminary_
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.name: field__change_2019_20
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.name: field__change_2020_21_preliminary_
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current dollars and percent change

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, details may not add to total. Percentages are computed using actual dollars reported. FYs 2020 and 2021 data include obligations from supplemental COVID-19–related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act). Federal intramural amounts for the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority are transfers to the other agencies in support of Operation Warp Speed. FY 2021 data are preliminary.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development.
